channel.title: Posts on Xia He-Bleinagel
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Xia He-Bleinagel

item.title: From A Stay-At-Home Mom To A Data Scientist
item.description: Life goes up and down. Important is that you never give up. Everyone has a chance to achieve his/her goal. This is my story of how I got a tech job from a stay-at-home mom. Remember, you are the best.

item.title: Create a Personal Website With Hugo
item.description: I built a personal website with Hugo successfully. I want to write down some key points to share my learning experience. Hugo is a static site generator and super fast. We will build one site with a theme template in 10 minutes.
